item.title: Say hello to Hugo
item.description: Today I migrated my blog to Hugo engine. So, it’s my first post here, yaay!
item.content:encoded:
Today I migrated my blog to Hugo engine. So, it’s my first post here, yaay!

There were only 2 posts in my last blog and I decided to not migrate the one about creating blog in Jekyll. Since it is not actual now.
